title: Traits and Features
content:
ve.On the first turn of combat, your movement speed increases by 3m, and you can make an attack that deals an additional 1d8 damge.

Gloom Stalker Lvl 3 (Ranger Subclass)

Your bond with your companion has deepened, unlocking their inner strength and giving them an Extra Attack.
